# The `HTTPServer.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file contains the declarations of the HTTPServer and HTTPServerRequest classes, the HTTPResponse, and StreamingHTTPResponse structs, and the streamFile function. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file contains the declarations of the HTTPServer and HTTPServerRequest classes, the HTTPResponse, and StreamingHTTPResponse structs, and the streamFile function.
